name: SCP-096: 15 Documents
description:
This is a new super jumpscare SCP horror game based on SCP-096.

You have been sent to an abandoned facility to collect 15 documents. However, SCP-096 doesn't make that easy.

See this image if you can't finish the game.

Warning
  • It's not suitable for you, if you feel excessive fear with horror contents.
  • It may not be suitable for some audience.
  • Viewer descretion is adviced.
Available Platforms
  • Windows (x64)
  • Android Phone
  • Newer Web Browser (Press TAB to pause)
Credits
  • SCP-096 - SCP Foundation (wikidot.com)
  • Some assets from SCP - Containment Breach (scpcbgame.com)
  • Additional sounds effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
